content.en: Gas sensor algorithms: Scientists have been exploring the use of algorithms to improve the performance of gas sensors. These algorithms, such as pattern recognition, data processing, and machine learning, are being used to help gas sensors differentiate between different types of hazardous gases, detect and identify gas mixtures, and predict gas concentrations. By combining gas sensors with these algorithms, researchers hope to enhance the selectivity and accuracy of gas detection, making it easier to monitor and trace various gas species.
content.da: Gassensoralgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer for at forbedre ydeevnen af gassensorer. Disse algoritmer, såsom mønstergenkendelse, databehandling og maskinlæring, bliver brugt til at hjælpe gassensorer med at skelne mellem forskellige typer af farlige gasser, opdage og identificere gasblandinger og forudsige gaskoncentrationer. Ved at kombinere gassensorer med disse algoritmer håber forskerne at forbedre selektiviteten og nøjagtigheden af gasdetektion, hvilket gør det lettere at overvåge og spore forskellige gasarter.
